abstract: NBC will show the closing ceremony beginning at 7 p.m. on Sunday.
snippet: NBC will show the closing ceremony beginning at 7 p.m. on Sunday.
lead_paragraph: NBC will telcast the closing ceremony of the Beijing Games beginning at 7 p.m. on Sunday. Writing on sib-blog Rings, Richard Sandomir notes that viewers can expect another elaborate show from the filmmaker Zhang Yimou:
